title: Bloomberg Intelligence Radio: Big Oil, PG&E and ETFs (Podcast)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Intelligence Radio: Big Oil, PG&E and ETFs (Podcast)
description:
In this week’s Bloomberg Intelligence Radio show, analyst Fernando Valle gives his outlook for Big Oil and the company cash flows while Vince Piazza outlines his views for energy exploration and production companies. Jaimin Patel discusses the challenges and opportunities for PG&E bondholders, while Paul Gulberg looks at private-equity cycles and the Carlyle Group. And ETF analyst Eric Balchunas delves into the "Beta Vortex" that's gnawing at active fund managers. Bloomberg Intelligence provides in-depth research and data on more than 2,000 companies and 130 industries. Hosts: Alix Steel and Paul Sweeney

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
